description:
When you have sustained a personal injury due to someone's negligence or wrongdoing, Simmons and Fletcher, P.C., Injury & Accident Lawyers in Houston, Texas, should be your law firm of choice. Why? Because our five attorneys and 35 support staff have only one goal: to get you the maximum amount of compensation. We have been speaking up for injured clients throughout Texas and the nation since 1979.

As a full-service personal injury law firm, we can help you in any of the following areas:

• Motor vehicle accidents
• Slip-and-fall, dog bites and other premises liability accidents
• Workplace accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Product liability
• Maritime and offshore accidents

Our law firm was founded on the Christian values of honor, integrity and compassion over 40 years ago, and we continue to hold these values dear today. Additional reasons why you should choose Simmons and Fletcher, P.C., are that attorney Paul Cannon holds certification from the Texas Board of Legal Specialization in Personal Injury Trial Law, and we have an excellent track record of obtaining substantial settlements and jury verdicts for our clients, including the following:

• $11,900,000 - Electrocuted worker burn injury settlement
• $1,387,500 - Drunk driving accident settlement
• $1,264,113 - 18-wheeler truck accident settlement
• $955,000 - Slip-and-fall accident premises liability settlement
• $300,000 - Dog bite settlement
• $233,124 - Commercial motor vehicle accident jury verdict

We offer free initial consultations, virtual appointments and accept all major credit cards.
